Strong, durable, and perfect for dining events.

[Information]

Our elegant silver bling cake stand is adorned with sparkly leaded cut crystals wired into place and designed with detailed attention. This glimmering gemmed cake stand consists of three rows of twinkling crystal beading around the edges and attractive silver ball feet for added regal feel. Sumptuously display your cake using this dreamy piece or create an eye catching centerpiece by placing it atop your bridal table with LED candles or a bowl of submersible floating candles reflecting enchanting silhouettes all around!


Additional Information:

  • Max Weight Capacity: 45 lbs
  • Uses: Birthdays, Weddings, Table Decoration, Event Decoration, Centerpieces.

Glass Height: 12"
Glass Diameter: 4.5"
Glass Depth: 12"
All sizes are approximate measurements

[Information]

Flaunt your floral, candle, or light display with this versatile metal and glass holder. Crafted from high quality gold plated metal and further beatified by light amber tinted glass container and sleek baroque detachable metal top, this glam piece will be a focal point at your upcoming special event!

Let your creativity run wild, light a standard taper or pillar candle to exude soft romantic glow, or get ingenious by filling fairy lights, flower petals, rose or hydrangea heads, or any other whimsical accent in these multi-purpose holder stands.

Splayed metal base give firm support to your candle and floral decorations, while ornate metal top simply add a seamless regal charm to your tabletops!

Additional Information:

  • Lid Height: 5"
  • Glass Height: 12"
  • Glass Diameter: 4.5"
  • Glass Depth: 12"
  • Base Diameter: 4.75"
  • Base Thickness: 1"

[Information]

Glamorize your wedding and party tables with this stunning masterpiece of seamless sparkle that features rows and rows of gem cut crystal beads, masterfully looped by shiny metallic silver rings. Combining intricate craftsmanship with regal glitz and glam, this lovely candle holder is an ideal decorative accent to elegantly titivate your Home, Office, or Party Space. Glistening metallic silver surface coupled with the multi-faceted acrylic crystal gems impart a royal feel and an opulent appeal to any table settings. This ornate beauty makes an affectionate gift to remind your loved ones of your elite aesthetic taste, and can also be used as a luxurious Candle Holder, Flower Vase, Flower Ball Holder, or simply as a deluxe Wedding Centerpiece. For a truly gorgeous setup, pair this plush piece with our Acrylic Crystal Candlesticks, Candle Holders, Chandelier Vases, Glass Candelabras, Crystal Pendant Centerpieces, Metal Cake and Cupcake Stands, and other Diamond Crystal Ornamentations.
